programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this classic horror, a group of college friends retreat to a remote cabin in the woods for one last week of partying, only to find themselves snacks for a gruesome flesh-eating virus(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims(n)

programme.title: Death Squad
programme.desc: In the year 2047, a rebel war agent is forced to go up against an oppressive government to expose their war crimes, while evading a vicious death squad. Stars Danny Glover, Daryl Hannah and Stephen Baldwin(n)

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time(n)

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n)

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: Psychological drama from director Atom Egoyan ("The Sweet Hereafter") stars Elaine Cassidy as Felicia, an Irish girl who follows her boyfriend to England when she discovers she's pregnant with his child. Unsure of his exact whereabouts, Felicia instead comes under the sway of Joseph (Bob Hoskins), a caterer who has a violent secret history with young homeless women just like Felicia. Based on the novel by William Trevor(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: National Lampoon Presents Cattle Call
programme.desc: A group of actresses plot revenge after learning that a high profile casting call was just a scam cooked up by three lonely losers looking to get laid. Stars Chelsea Handler and Thomas Ian Nicholas

programme.title: Spring Breakers
programme.desc: After four college girls are busted for robbing a fast food shack to fund their spring break, they are unexpectedly bailed out by an infamous local thug who lures them into a criminal underbelly and takes them on a wild, violent and riotous vacation. Stars Selena Gomez and James Franco

programme.title: Brad Williams: Fun Size
programme.desc: Hilarious stand-up comedy special featuring energetic comedian Brad Williams' inimitable take on disability, relationships, sex and race with perfect timing and explosive delivery that proves that you can in fact overcome any shortcomings... pun intended

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
programme.desc: Stand up comedian Pete Correale explores the absurdities of life, love and marriage in his hilarious comedy special where he gives his homegrown New Yorker take on everything from the joy of ice cream to the pain of political correctness

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: A former Navy SEAL seeks revenge after a nightclub owner attacks his wife but when a bounty is placed on his head in retaliation, he must escape LA while being pursued by every criminal, wise guy and thug in town

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Jay Mohr: Happy. And A Lot.
programme.desc: Stand up comedian Jay Mohr reveals everything from the intimate - marriage, raising a child and more - to the extraordinary in this hilarious comedy special

programme.title: Speak
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart is a teenager traumatized into silence after a summer party ends in a police raid that leaves her ostracized by her friends but unable to explain her actions. Elizabeth Perkins, D.B. Sweeney and Steve Zahn costar in this drama based on the award-winning novel by Laurie Halse Anderson

programme.title: The Next Hit
programme.desc: A mystery suspense thriller about a record company that takes an unorthodox approach to boosting sales by putting a 'hit' on their marquee talent's life with hopes of creating a multi-platinum recording legend

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: River's Edge
programme.desc: The lives of a group of teenagers are thrown into a moral spin when one of them murders his girlfriend. Faced with the brutal reality of death, each must decide whether to turn their friend in to the police, or to help him escape the consequences of his dreadful deed. Stars Keanu Reeves, Crispin Glover, Ione Skye and Dennis Glover

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims

Elizabeth Perkins, D.B. Sweeney and Steve Zahn costar in this drama based on the award-winning novel by Laurie Halse Anderson

programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: Satire about a bumbling Iranian immigrant who wins the green card lottery and moves to Los Angeles to pursue his dream of becoming an American hero and unwittingly becomes embroiled in a conspiracy to start the next world war

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets

programme.title: The Lucky Ones
programme.desc: Three Iraq War veterans embark on a stateside road trip full of startling revelations and emotional catharsis in this comedy drama starring Tim Robbins, Michael Pena and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: A confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life becomes enthralled with a young man with a violent past and embarks on a dangerous road trip. Stars Russell Crowe and Sophie Traub

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.desc: After a home burglary results in the murder of a young boy, a small town detective is called in to solve the case, one that has galvanized an entire community around the victim's politically powerful mother. Nick Stahl, Rachel Nichols and Kellan Lutz star in this crime thriller(n)

programme.title: The Lucky Ones
programme.desc: Three Iraq War veterans embark on a stateside road trip full of startling revelations and emotional catharsis in this comedy drama starring Tim Robbins, Michael Pena and Rachel McAdams(n)

programme.title: Southpaw

With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Good Kill

programme.title: The Original Kings Of Comedy

Cedric the Entertainer headlines with TV stars Bernie Mac, D.L. Hughley and Steve Harvey, entertaining a stadium-size gathering of more than ten thousand fans in this concert film from director Spike Lee(n)

programme.title: The Lucky Ones

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse(n)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship(n)

programme.title: Daydream Nation
programme.desc: Bored by her new town and classmates, the new girl (Kat Dennings) seduces a handsome teacher, flirts with a stoner, and avoids a local serial killer targeting teenagers. Josh Lucas and Reece Thompson costar in this offbeat dark comedy(n)

programme.title: Veronika Decides to Die
programme.desc: Sarah Michelle Gellar stars as a young woman who attempts suicide and wakes up inside a mysterious mental asylum, run by an unorthodox psychiatrist, where she learns that she has only weeks to live(n)

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama(n)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years

programme.title: TRUMPED: Inside the Greatest Political Upset of All Time
programme.desc: An intimate behind the scenes look into the biggest political upset in recent US history. Mark Halperin, John Heilemann and Mark McKinnon follow the rise of Donald Trump from the primaries through the debates to the drama of election night, featuring a trove of never-before-seen footage secured during the making of the SHOWTIME documentary series 'The Circus.'

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
programme.desc: A legendary Chinese hero, believed dead, returns to Shanghai in disguise and uses nefarious tactics to infiltrate a criminal empire and employs his martial arts skills to seek justice

programme.title: Jimi Hendrix: Electric Church
programme.desc: Documentary unveiling previously unseen footage of Jimi Hendrix's seminal performance at the 1970 Atlanta Pop Festival playing his greatest hits in front of 300,000 people. Features interviews with Hendrix, and fellow musicians, including Paul McCartney and Mitch Mitchell, who provide new insight into the musician's personality and genius at the juncture of this important cultural gathering, hailed as the 'Southern Woodstock'

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: An inner-city single mother (Angela Bassett) packs up her kids and heads off to visit the crass but surprisingly sweet country cousins she never knew she had in this warm comedy costarring Rick Fox and Sofia Vergara

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: The outrageously funny stand up Sebastian Maniscalco stars in this comedy special, blending his high energy physicality and his inimitable facial expressions to send up modern life through the lens of his old-world, Italian-American upbringing

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: In this classic comedy based on Cameron Crowe's undercover expose on life in a Southern California high school, a group of students wrestle with love, sex, drugs and making their way into the world. Stars Sean Penn, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Phoebe Cates

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: The Nasty Show Volume II Hosted by Brad Williams
programme.desc: Comedian Brad Williams hosts part two of the most deranged minds in comedy, including Bobby Slayton, Corey Holcomb, Paula Bel, Mike Ward, Yamaneika and Ralphie May in a hilarious show where no subject is too taboo

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A group of successful college friends reunite for a wedding, but when one of the bridesmaids gets her hands on the best man's steamy new novel about to hit bookstores, a series of scandals about the friends are revealed that wreak havoc on their relationships. Stars Taye Diggs and Nia Long

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: In this classic comedy based on Cameron Crowe's undercover expose on life in a Southern California high school, a group of students wrestle with love, sex, drugs and making their way into the world. Stars Sean Penn, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Phoebe Cates

programme.title: Witless Protection

Jenny McCarthy costars in this wacky comedy with Peter Stormare, Eric Roberts, Ivana Milicevic, Yaphet Kotto (as the same character he played in "Midnight Run") and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: A quirky comedy starring Bill Murray as a hedonistic war veteran, with a penchant for alcohol and gambling, who is entrusted with babysitting the 12-year-old boy next door. As the improbable pair develops a friendship both of them learn to grow up, in unexpected ways. Also stars Melissa McCarthy and Naomi Watts

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). programme.title: This Is My Bullshit ... And You're Welcome To It

programme.title: Bert Kreischer: The Machine
programme.desc: Stand-up comedy special featuring inimitable storyteller Bert Kreisher, who expounds on a series of incredible and hilarious tales - from an unforgettable run-in with a grizzly bear to his legendary travels in Russia(n)

programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.desc: In this dark thriller, a fugitive IRA soldier promises to protect the lover of the British soldier he was holding hostage, and when he seeks her out in London, they both have dangerous secrets they're unwilling to reveal. Stars Forest Whitaker

programme.desc: A group of unsuspecting college students explore the haunted mansion of a long-dead Hollywood actress and get more than they bargained for when the sexual frenzy of the paranormal world reveals itself

programme.desc: Three soldiers returning home to Spokane, Washington from the Iraq War find the adjustment back to normal life anything but smooth in this heartbreaking drama starring Samuel L. Jackson, Jessica Biel, Brian Presley, Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson, Jeff Nordling and Christina Ricci

programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring

programme.title: Internal Affairs
programme.desc: Police thriller starring Richard Gere as a crooked cop who can launder money, run a scam, fix a bad rap and will even murder, for a price, but when an investigator tries to bring him down, he uses his skills at manipulation – attacking the man’s career, marriage and even his sanity – to stop him in any way he can. Also stars Andy Garcia

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone returns to the iconic character of John Rambo in this action sequel that finds the middle-aged veteran living quietly in Thailand as a mechanic and snake wrangler - until a group of American missionaries are caught up in the bloody Burmese civil war raging nearby and reach out to the reluctant killing machine for rescue. Julie Benz, Paul Schulze and Ken Howard costar in this long-awaited follow-up

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this classic horror, a group of college friends retreat to a remote cabin in the woods for one last week of partying, only to find themselves snacks for a gruesome flesh-eating virus

programme.title: Tony Roberts: Motorcity Motormouth
programme.desc: Detroit native Tony T. Roberts returns to his hometown for a raucous and occasionally musical night of stand up where no topic is off limits and anything can happen

programme.title: Black Christmas (2006)
programme.desc: This terrifying remake of the classic 1974 horror movie credited with spawning the "slasher" subgenre stars Katie Cassidy, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Lacey Chabert and Michelle Trachtenberg as ill-fated residents of a sorority house that also happens to be the childhood home of a psychotic killer - and his destination when he uses a candy cane to lethal effect in breaking out of an insane asylum. Oliver Hudson and Andrea Martin costar in this effective holiday scream-fest from writer/director Glen Morgan

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: During World War I, a disparate group of young American adventurers comes to France to fight for the Lafayette Escadrille, a volunteer squadron of pilots battling the forces of fascism in the years before their country entered the war. James Franco, Martin Henderson, Tyler Labine, Jean Reno and Jennifer Decker star in this stirringly patriotic salute to forgotten heroes

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: Red Corner
programme.desc: Richard Gere stars as a hotshot entertainment lawyer who travels to China for business and has a one-night stand with a young Chinese woman, then wakes to find that she has been murdered and he has been framed with the crime

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: American Heart
programme.desc: For most of us, the notion of living on the streets is little more than food for thought. But for a homeless father (Jeff Bridges) and his teenage son (Edward Furlong), it's a cold, hard fact of life. Director Martin Bell first explored life in the not-so-great outdoors with his 1984 documentary "Streetwise," an unforgettable look at the day-to-day tragedy of Seattle's street teens. With this eye-opening drama, he looks at this avoidable human catastrophe from a somewhat different perspective. Featuring music by Tom Waits

programme.title: Medium Raw
programme.desc: Detective Johnny Morgan finally tracks down the deranged serial killer that kidnapped and murdered his sister 20 years earlier but is disappointed when the fiend receives life imprisonment in an insane asylum instead of the death penalty. Visiting the prisoner intending to exact revenge, Johnny is instead trapped inside the institution when a power outage frees the inmates and seals off all escape routes. Andrew Cymek, John Rhys-Davies and William B. Davis star in this horror thriller

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: In this martial arts action flick, Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a Canadian Mountie who is assigned to a bizarre case involving the murder of prison inmates. Sent to jail, in the undercover guise of a criminal, he is hot on the trail of the killer until one of his former busts is transferred to the same prison

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: A former Navy SEAL seeks revenge after a nightclub owner attacks his wife but when a bounty is placed on his head in retaliation, he must escape LA while being pursued by every criminal, wise guy and thug in town

programme.desc: Richard Gere stars as a hotshot entertainment lawyer who travels to China for business and has a one-night stand with a young Chinese woman, then wakes to find that she has been murdered and he has been framed with the crime(n)

Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy(n)

programme.title: Hoodlum

But a brewing rivalry with the Mafia threatens to raise the stakes to dangerous new levels(n)

programme.title: The Seven Five

Packed with interviews with those who broke the law and those who protected it, in what turned out to be the biggest police corruption scandal in New York City history(n)

programme.title: Pound of Flesh
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a former black ops agent who has traveled to South Asia to donate a kidney to his dying niece but wakes to find that he is the latest victim of organ theft, forcing him to carve a blood soaked path through the darkest corners of the city to find the culprits, in a race against the clock(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy(n)

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: In this dark thriller, a fugitive IRA soldier promises to protect the lover of the British soldier he was holding hostage, and when he seeks her out in London, they both have dangerous secrets they're unwilling to reveal. Stars Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Orange County
programme.desc: The stressful rite of passage known as the college admissions process is gleefully lampooned in this comedy starring Colin Hanks as privileged teen Shaun Brumder, whose sure-fire application to Stanford is botched by his scrambled guidance counselor, leaving him to repair the damage with his slacker brother Lance (Jack Black) and girlfriend Ashley (Schuyler Fisk)

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Electrocuted in a hairdryer mishap, womanizing ad exec Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of the opposite sex. At first, Nick thinks he's been given a terrific advantage in the bedroom and the boardroom, but soon his psychic gift turns the once-clueless Nick into a better father, employee and man, a transformation that does not go unnoticed by his beautiful boss Darcy (Helen Hunt). Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: The Discoverers
programme.desc: A washed up history professor takes his begrudging teenage kids on a road trip to a conference, in the hope of getting his career back on track but when his elderly father goes AWOL, he is forced to make a detour on a Lewis and Clark historical reenactment trek, which prompts a family journey of discovery and connection. Stars Lewis Birch and Madeleine Martin

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw

programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: During World War I, a disparate group of young American adventurers comes to France to fight for the Lafayette Escadrille, a volunteer squadron of pilots battling the forces of fascism in the years before their country entered the war. James Franco, Martin Henderson, Tyler Labine, Jean Reno and Jennifer Decker star in this stirringly patriotic salute to forgotten heroes(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration(n)

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy(n)

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy(n)

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film(n)

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.desc: When a woman discovers her boyfriend is cheating on her with her best friend, she plans a romantic weekend getaway for just the three of them, complete with terror, torture and twisted psychosexual games. Stars AnnaLynne McCord and Billy Zane

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit

programme.title: Fight Valley
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring, her sister begins training under a respected ex-fighter to bring justice to the killer

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: The Lucky Ones
programme.desc: Three Iraq War veterans embark on a stateside road trip full of startling revelations and emotional catharsis in this comedy drama starring Tim Robbins, Michael Pena and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Written and directed by the Coen brothers, this quirky crime thriller follows the desperate plight of a car salesman who is so far in debt that he hires two thugs to kidnap his own wife so that he can reap the cash ransom from her wealthy father. Stars Frances McDormand, William H. Macy and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Knock Knock, It's Tig Notaro
programme.desc: Documentary that follows deadpan comedian Tig Notaro across the country as she puts on a series of stand-up performances in the homes, backyards, barns and basements of her most loyal fans, with each intimate show offering the potential for epiphany or disaster

programme.title: Whore (1991)
programme.desc: Theresa Russell ("Black Widow") stars in this unflinching portrait of a belligerent, unrepentant - and entirely unsympathetic - prostitute that's a stark contrast to Hollywood's many "hooker with a heart of gold" fables. Antonio Fargas, Jason Saucier and Benjamin Mouton co-star in this dark drama from director Ken Russell ("Crimes of Passion," "The Lair of the White Worm")

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Marcia Gay Harden stars as a librarian who travels to Costa Rica to escape her mid-life crisis and finds herself on an unexpected journey filled with adventure and romance

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Comedy starring Daniel Radcliffe as a med school dropout who can't keep his love life in order or keep it separate from a new friendship with a woman who, inconveniently, has a boyfriend. Also stars Zoe Kazan and Adam Driver

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame

programme.title: Things You Can Tell Just By Looking At Her
programme.desc: Glenn Close, Holly Hunter, Cameron Diaz, Calista Flockhart, Kathy Baker and Amy Brenneman star in Rodrigo Garcia's debut feature, composed of five narratives which examine the hidden emotional lives of women in contemporary Los Angeles. An unmarried bank manager faces the possibility of an abortion; a police detective discovers her blind sister's astute insight; a lonely gynecologist consults a psychic; a lesbian couple confronts the finality of their relationship; and a single mother becomes erotically intrigued by a dwarf next door

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Comedy starring Daniel Radcliffe as a med school dropout who can't keep his love life in order or keep it separate from a new friendship with a woman who, inconveniently, has a boyfriend. Also stars Zoe Kazan and Adam Driver

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.desc: This two-time Oscar® nominee stars Laura Linney as a single mom whose ordered life is disrupted by a visit from her irresponsible brother (Mark Ruffalo). programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack(n)

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor(n)

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: A Manhattan sophisticate escorts wealthy men, taking extravagant gifts and money but not their affections: she has commitment issues

programme.title: Bride of Frankenstein
programme.desc: In the masterful sequel to the 1931 classic, the mad scientist is persuaded by a creepy doctor to create a mate for his creature to help fabricate a new race, but all doesn't go as planned. Elsa Lanchester has dual roles as novelist Mary Shelley and the frightful fright-wig-wearing bride

programme.title: Bullitt
programme.desc: A lone-wolf San Francisco police detective tracks syndicate killers after failing to protect a mob informant, while an ambitious senator strives to shut down his investigation. Features one of the screen's all-time great car chases

programme.title: Cabaret
programme.desc: A flighty American nightclub singer and a shy English writer embark on a doomed romance in Weimar Republic-era Berlin, as the Nazi party begins steadily rising to power and the mood becomes dark. Stars Liza Minnelli and Joel Grey won Oscars, along with director Bob Fosse

programme.title: Cabin in the Sky
programme.desc: A down and out compulsive gambler is killed during a shootout and the Devil is ready to claim his soul unless he can reform himself and make things right with his worried wife

programme.title: Caged
programme.desc: Contact with criminals in a prison transforms a young woman into an embittered convict, where she fights to survive among brutal and hardened inmates. Eleanor Parker was nominated for Best Actress as the imprisoned woman and Hope Emerson received a Best Supporting Actress nod as the institution's sadistic matron. The screenplay was also Oscar nominated

programme.title: Cain and Mabel
programme.desc: The musical romance between a prize fighter and a Broadway dancer

programme.title: Calamity Jane
programme.desc: Doris Day saddles up as wild wild-West heroine Calamity Jane, a tomboyish gunslinger who leaves Arizona to go to Chicago to bring back a stage star to perform in a frontier saloon, while pining for an attractive soldier and swooning over rough-riding Wild Bill Hickok. Featuring the Oscar-winning song "Secret Love

programme.title: Camelot
programme.desc: King Arthur's idyllic kingdom of Camelot is a heyday for old Britain until an affair blooms between Queen Guinevere and Sir Lancelot, destroying the trust of the Knights of the Round Table and bringing the nation's golden period to an end, in this cinematic staging of the Broadway musical

programme.title: Camille
programme.desc: A stately but sickly Paris courtesan is swept off her feet by an equally enamored diplomat, but she leaves him to protect his career, only to later be reunited with him---briefly and tragically

programme.title: Captain Blood
programme.desc: Swashbuckling saga about a 17th-century Irish doctor who's unjustly charged with treason and sent to Jamaica, where he's sold into slavery, but when pirates attack the island, he and fellow prisoners escape, commandeer a Spanish galleon and set sail on the high seas. This Best Picture nominee made Errol Flynn a star, and is one of nine films he made with director Michael Curtiz

programme.title: Captains Courageous
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy won Best Actor as an earthy Portuguese fisherman who takes under wing a tycoon's spoiled young son who's fallen off a transatlantic luxury liner and been by a passing fishing boat. It's a coming-of-age adventure during which the lad learns lessons in respect, self-sufficiency and discipline. The Best Picture nominee is based on the Rudyard Kipling book

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: Romance, World War II intrigue, a heroic American expatriate, a brave Czech freedom fighter, arrogant Nazis, patriotic Frenchmen, blackmail, black-marketeers and the usual suspects make this Best Picture even more an audience favorite as time goes by. Director Michael Curtiz scored an Oscar, as did the script. (cc)

programme.title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
programme.desc: Paul Newman and Elizabeth Taylor sizzle together in this Oscar-nominated Best Picture that adapts Tennessee Williams' Pulitzer-winning play about a smoldering wife (Taylor) who watches her bitter young husband (Newman) turn to the bottle. Newman, Taylor and director Richard Brooks also were nominated. Remade in 1976 and 1984

programme.title: Citizen Kane
programme.desc: After a multimillionaire newspaper magnate utters the mysterious name "Rosebud" on his deathbed, reporters scramble to decipher the word's meaning, touching off a fascinating series of flashbacks on his life, career and relationships. Orson Welles cowrote (and shared the Best Original Screenplay Oscar with Herman J. Mankiewicz), produced, directed and stars as Kane

programme.title: Coal Miner's Daughter
programme.desc: Sissy Spacek did all her own singing and won an Oscar for her portrayal of country-music star Loretta Lynn, following her from the backwoods of Kentucky to her performing in remote honky-tonks to her triumph on the stage of the Grand Ole Opry. A Best Picture nominee

programme.title: Comrade X
programme.desc: An American reporter in the U.S.S.R. writes anti-Soviet propaganda under an assumed name and, when he is discovered, is blackmailed into helping get a hotel porter's daughter out of the country

programme.title: The Constant Nymph
programme.desc: A self-centered European musician is idolized by a young Belgian woman with a serious heart condition. Though fond of her, the composer opts for marriage to her socialite cousin--and lives to regret the move. Joan Fontaine was nominated for Best Actress as the jilted woman

programme.title: Cool Hand Luke
programme.desc: Best Actor nominee Paul Newman gives one of the best performances of his career in this prison drama about a defiant loner doing time in a Southern penal camp, where escape is futile and punishment sadistic. George Kennedy won a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as the convict leader Dragline, and Strother Martin is excellent as the prison official who can't abide a "failure to communicate." (repeat)

programme.title: Coquette
programme.desc: A Southern belle must choose between three different suitors, and when she chooses the least viable of them, her father chases after the couple with a gun, which leads to a violent altercation

programme.title: The Corn Is Green
programme.desc: An ambitious teacher opens a school in a poor Welsh mining town and butts heads with the mine owners, but eventually she discovers a prize student who, after a couple of years, tries to get into an elite university. (repeat)

programme.title: The Corsican Brothers
programme.desc: Swashbuckling adventure about a man of honor and a rogue who battle over a woman's affections, and then come to realize they are twins, separated at birth, who share an uncanny psychic connection. Based on the Alexandre Dumas novel

programme.title: Crossfire
programme.desc: One of the first major-studio efforts to confront anti-Semitism, this Best Picture nominee is a film-noir account of a quartet of GIs who get involved in the murder of a Jewish Army veteran

programme.title: The Crowd
programme.desc: Silent classic about an "ordinary" Manhattan couple struggling to survive in the big city on his meager wages and the tragic accident that threatens to destroy them

programme.title: A Cry in the Dark
programme.desc: A dramatization of the real-life story of Lindy Chamberlain, an Australian woman who was convicted of her 9-week-old daughter's murder, despite her insistence that the infant was in fact attacked by a dingo(n)

programme.title: Days of Wine and Roses
programme.desc: A portrait of "a couple of drunks on the sea of booze" follows a couple who descend into alcoholism and eventually separate, but after the husband gets clean he hopes for a reconciliation for the sake of their daughter. The Henry Mancini-Johnny Mercer theme song won an Oscar. Jack Lemmon and Lee Remick were nominated for Best Actor and Actress(n)

programme.title: The Deer Hunter
programme.desc: The Vietnam War destroys the lives of three friends who survived brutal torture by the Viet Cong. Years later, an attempt by one of the men to track down the other two reveals just how deep their mental and physical scars run(n)

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Four city dwellers take on the white water of a river in the backwoods of Georgia to enjoy the beauty of nature before a dam project ruins it. But the group gets separated, and the river and its surroundings are much worse than expected(n)

programme.title: Designing Woman

programme.desc: The eight remaining ladies compete on a mud-drenched gridiron. The football game's MVP wins a date with Bret. (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love
programme.desc: The ladies face off to determine who can best handle the grind of being a touring musician. Later, they celebrate Bret's birthday. (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love
programme.desc: The remaining six ladies are split into two teams to shoot an album cover for Bret's new release. The winning team's creative director is awarded a private date with Bret and the two models get a tandem date. (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love
programme.desc: The remaining five women are interviewed by three of Bret's biggest fans, who then decide on the woman they think is best for Bret. (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love
programme.desc: The final four ladies travel to Las Vegas to see Bret perform. After the gig, backstage partying gets out of control. (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love
programme.desc: The parents of the three remaining ladies meet Bret. Meanwhile, trust issues cause turmoil in the house. (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love
programme.desc: The season wraps up with Bret taking the final two ladies to Cabo San Lucas, Mexico. When they return home, Bret chooses one to “rock his world.” (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love 2
programme.desc: The second season begins with 20 women looking to win Bret's affections. After a photo shoot and cocktail mixer, Bret trims the field to 15. (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love 2
programme.desc: The ladies compete in a peep-show contest. Later, Bret holds a dance-off, and three contestants are eliminated. (repeat)

programme.title: Rock of Love 2
programme.desc: The ladies put on roller skates and try to outmaneuver one another while pushing a stroller. Later, Bret spends some alone time with one of the more disliked contestants, leading to tension in the house. In the end, two ladies are eliminated. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay wants Michael to spend more quality time with her, while Michael wants to spend more quality time with his favorite video game. At first, Jay calls the situation “a breakdown in communication.” Then she ratchets it up to “You don't love me.” So it's off to a shrink. Meanwhile, Jr. has difficulty believing that other boys just might find Claire attractive. Dr. Madison: Kristin Wilson. Dr. Thomas: Jason Stuart. Waiter: Kevin Knotts. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael breaks his no-dating-for-Claire policy, on the condition that her first date be a double date---with Michael and Jay. Back at home, Jr. baby-sits Kady and nickels-and-dimes small favors from her. Tony: Andrew McFarland. Concession Guy: Stuart Nixon. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay goes overboard trying to impress---and one-up---the boss after Michael hires her to help out around the office. Meanwhile, Kady makes a new friend in an old, out-of-this-world doll. Kady: Parker McKenna Posey. Claire: Jennifer Freeman. Janet: Tisha Campbell-Martin. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael decides he likes Claire's straitlaced boyfriend, Tony (Andrew McFarlane), so naturally Claire dumps him for a hip-hop swaggerer (Donnell Barrett) who calls himself 1040 EZ (“'Cause I be taxin' my women”). Michael is anything but pleased. Nor is Jay pleased when she sees the portrait of her that Jr. has drawn. Claire: Jennifer Freeman. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jr.'s awkward around girls, so Michael coaches him in the manly art of attracting women. He learns his lesson only too well. Meanwhile, Jay's mad at Michael because she dreamt that he had been fooling around with Janet Jackson. Amber: Claudette Ortiz. Jr. George O. Gore II. Jay: Tisha Campbell-Martin. Claire: Jennifer Freeman. Michael: Damon Wayans. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael and Jay attend a couples seminar, where they discover that their “fantastic” relationship isn't exactly that. Meanwhile, two of Jr.'s friends (Damon Wayans Jr., Michael Wayans) discover a way to use Claire's clothing-store job to make money for themselves. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: After striking out with Fancy at a bowling alley, Jamie calls upon Cupid (Gary Coleman) to help him win back Fancy's affections. Meanwhile, Mouse starts dating a new woman he met with the love god's help. Tamika: Tami-Adrian George. Stephanie: Tess Drake. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Mouse: Suli McCullough. Gloria: Karen Maruyama. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: In the series finale, Jamie and Fancy's wedding day arrives, but problems with the groom's tuxedo hamper Jamie's efforts to get to the ceremony on time. Janice: Gladys Knight. (repeat)

programme.desc: Jamie tries to undermine Fancy's already tricky relationship with her snooty future mother-in-law (Jennifer Lewis). Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Silas: Alan F. Smith. Uncle Junior: Garrett Morris. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Conclusion. Yandy confronts Juju again; Tara and Amina see each other for the first time in more than one year; and Samantha's reeling from a visit to Mendeecees. Later, Yandy doesn't show up at Lil Mendeecees' birthday party. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Leave It to Stevie
programme.desc: Newly-single rapper Stevie J's personal and professional life is chronicled in this reality series. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: K. Michelle: My Life
programme.desc: K must decide whether or not to delay her restaurant opening. Later, K receives two surprises. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love Don't Cost a Thing
programme.desc: A high-school geek (Nick Cannon) bribes a popular classmate (Christina Milian) to be his girlfriend so he will be considered cool. A remake of "Can't Buy Me Love." Directed by Troy Beyer. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Amina gives birth to her baby; Cardi receives a letter from Tommy; and Kimbella's friendship with Yandy is pulled into her relationship problems with Juelz. Later, Remy Ma surprises Papoose with a gift. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. The ladies arrive in Mexico, but Yandy brings an uninvited guest who fuels her feud with Kimbella. Later, Juju's book stirs up drama; and Self exacts revenge on Cisco back in New York. (repeat)(n)

programme.desc: Obiad w gronie przyjaciółek - oto hasło dzisiejszego spotkania. W menu znajdzie się przepyszne tapas z kurzymi wątróbkami w sherry. Na deser natomiast gospodyni poda białą czekoladę i pudding

programme.title: Włoskie smaki Micheli
programme.desc: Michela Chiappa prezentuje przepisy na klasyczne dania z Włoch. Odsłania sekrety kuchni z Półwyspu Apenińskiego i gości znakomitych kucharzy z tego regionu świata

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Tym razem jadą do Norwegii

programme.title: Modowa sprawa narodowa
programme.desc: Cekiny, róże i tygrysie cętki - o tym i wielu innych przykładach złego gustu na zawsze zapomni każda z uczestniczek programu. Sztab specjalistów zadba o to, by z ich szaf zniknęły kiczowate ubrania

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Maria Ellis chce rozwieść się z mężem Charlesem, gdyż czuje się przez niego zaniedbywana. Wkrótce odkrywa, że mężczyzna miał w innym mieście drugą... żonę, Emily Parcells. Dotąd obie kobiety nie wiedziały o swoim istnieniu. Teraz postanawiają razem wnieść do sądu sprawę przeciwko Charlesowi. Ich reprezentantką zostaje Jane. Na sali rozpraw okazuje się, że obrońcą oskarżanego o bigamię mężczyzny jest Tony Nicastro, były chłopak Bingum. Tymczasem Kim obawia się, że może być w ciąży. Mimo tego zgadza się reprezentować przed sądem przyjaciółkę, Caitlin Tanner. Chce ona odzyskać dziecko, które urodziła dla niej surogatka, Lana Dooley. Dziewczyna dostała pieniądze, a następnie porwała niemowlę z domu Caitlin. Kim podejrzewa, że za uprowadzeniem nie kryją się wcale rozbudzone uczucia macierzyńskie..

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Vincent Libérati (Vincent Elbaz) jest jednym z najlepszych agentów francuskiego kontrwywiadu. Pewnego dnia dowiaduje się, że jest śmiertelnie chory. Postanawia zakończyć karierę i spędzić resztę życia z rodziną w Marsylii. Byli szefowie składają mu jednak ryzykowną ofertę - proponują mu eksperymentalny lek, który daje szansę na uratowanie życia. W zamian oczekują realizacji karkołomnego zadania w szeregach elitarnej grupy tajnych agentów walczących ze zorganizowaną przestępczością. Nadgorliwość Juliette doprowadza do aresztowania osób, które Vincent chciał wykorzystać w swojej misji. Zatrzymana zostaje także Marie, co zmusza Vincenta do opracowania planu jej odbicia(r)

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Vincent Libérati (Vincent Elbaz) jest jednym z najlepszych agentów francuskiego kontrwywiadu. Pewnego dnia dowiaduje się, że jest śmiertelnie chory. Postanawia zakończyć karierę i spędzić resztę życia z rodziną w Marsylii. Byli szefowie składają mu jednak ryzykowną ofertę - proponują mu eksperymentalny lek, który daje szansę na uratowanie życia. W zamian oczekują realizacji karkołomnego zadania w szeregach elitarnej grupy tajnych agentów walczących ze zorganizowaną przestępczością. Nadgorliwość Juliette doprowadza do aresztowania osób, które Vincent chciał wykorzystać w swojej misji. Zatrzymana zostaje także Marie, co zmusza Vincenta do opracowania planu jej odbicia(r)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Nowa Rewia Kabaretowa
programme.desc: W programie wystąpią najlepsi w kraju specjaliści od rozśmieszania publiczności. Na ekranie znane wszystkim Polakom grupy kabaretowe, m.in. Formacja Chatelet, Łowcy.B, Koń Polski, Kabaret pod Wyrwigroszem, Elita, Kabaret Skeczów Męczących i grupa Nowaki. Pojawią się liczni goście specjalni, a także sceniczne osobowości, takie jak Krzysztof Piasecki, Tomasz Jachimek, Jerzy Kryszak, Katarzyna Pakosińska czy Andrzej Grabowski. W ostatnich latach Kabaret Skeczów Męczących zdobył ogromną popularność. Program stanowi podumowanie jego artystycznej działalności. Formacja słynie z improwizacji i interakcji z publicznością

programme.title: Mercy Street
programme.desc: Oparta na faktach opowieść o codzienności Amerykanów żyjących za czasów wojny secesyjnej. Wirginia, rok 1862. Miasteczko Aleksandria leży na samej granicy konfliktu, który podzielił stany Północy i Południa. W mieszczącym się tam hotelu Mansion House powstaje szpital polowy założony przez okupujące miasto wojska Unii. To właśnie tam krzyżują się drogi dwóch wolontariuszek: stojącej po stronie Północy pielęgniarki Mary Phinney (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) oraz Emmy Green (Hannah James), słynącej z piękności zwolenniczki Konfederatów. Życiem mieszkańców Aleksandrii rządzą bezlitosny przypadek, nienawiść, wola przetrwania i - mimo wszystko - nadzieja

programme.title: Wydział operacji specjalnych
programme.desc: Kulisy pracy jednostki specjalnej CIU. Pierwsza sprawa dotyczy narkotykowego bossa. Funkcjonariusze sporo ryzykują, próbując zbliżyć się do wpływowego mafiosa

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: W głowie 38-letniej Olgi z Poznania coraz szybciej rozwija się guz, w wyniku czego przestała słyszeć na jedno ucho. Ma też lekką asymetrię lewej części twarzy i problemy ze wzrokiem. Wizja powikłań sprawiła, że uciekała przed decyzją o operacji przez kilka lat. Próbowała leczyć się przy pomocy medycyny naturalnej, a nawet jogi. Od pewnego czasu guz zaczął jednak rosnąć w zastraszającym tempie, co zmusiło Olgę do podjęcia decyzji o leczeniu. Uwierzyła, że dr Głowacki ze Szpitala Zachodniego w Grodzisku Mazowieckim może jej pomóc. Operacja, której podjął się specjalista jest bardzo ryzykowna i skomplikowana

programme.title: Panny młode z piekła rodem
programme.desc: Twórcy serii w każdym odcinku przybliżają widzom gorączkowe ślubne przygotowania kolejnej pary narzeczonych. Zwłaszcza przyszłe panny młode są zdeterminowane, aby mieć idealny ślub. Dla wszystkich, którzy stają im na drodze są złośliwe, wymagające i egoistyczne. Aby zrealizować swój cel, są gotowe zapomnieć o skrupułach czy sentymentach. Wszystko bowiem ma być tak, jak to one sobie wymarzyły!

programme.title: Po prostu gotuj! z Rachel Allen
programme.sub-title: Po prostu gotuj! z Rachel Allen (odc. 13)
programme.desc: Boże Narodzenie to okazja, by pochwalić się swoimi umiejętnościami kulinarnymi. Rachel prezentuje takie popisowe dania jak: cynamonowe mascarpone, szynka glazurowana i rozpływający się w ustach indyk(n)

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: W głowie 38-letniej Olgi z Poznania coraz szybciej rozwija się guz, w wyniku czego przestała słyszeć na jedno ucho. Ma też lekką asymetrię lewej części twarzy i problemy ze wzrokiem. programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię

programme.title: Modowa sprawa narodowa
programme.desc: Cekiny, róże i tygrysie cętki - o tym i wielu innych przykładach złego gustu na zawsze zapomni każda z uczestniczek programu. Sztab specjalistów zadba o to, by z ich szaf zniknęły kiczowate ubrania(n)

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Helen Wakefield publicznie policzkuje Jacka Bryanta, trenera szkolnej drużyny koszykówki. Mężczyzna doznaje poważnej kontuzji szyi i domaga się odszkodowania za utratę zdrowia. Helen uderzyła szkoleniowca, gdyż dyskryminował jej córkę, nie pozwalając ośmiolatce grać w pierwszym składzie zespołu. Zamiast niej wystawiał swoje dziecko. Sprawa wydaje się przesądzona, gdyż wina Helen jest bezsprzeczna. Jane postanawia jednak wykorzystać przed sądem pewne informacje o Bryancie, które zdobyła jeszcze jako Deb. Wkrótce Teri wzywa Bingum na posterunek policji. Razem z kuzynem Edwardem została bowiem aresztowana za zakłócanie porządku publicznego. Sprawa jest jednak poważniejsza, gdyż Edwardowi grozi deportacja do Korei Płd. Mężczyzna jest w szoku, gdyż całe życie spędził w USA. Jedyną szansą, by go ocalić jest wyjawienie mu rodzinnej tajemnicy związanej z jego urodzeniem. Tony dostaje awans. W związku z tym musi przeprowadzić się do Waszyngtonu. Bingum zastanawia się, czy wyjechać razem z nim(n)

programme.title: No Limit
programme.desc: Vincent Libérati (Vincent Elbaz) jest jednym z najlepszych agentów francuskiego kontrwywiadu. Pewnego dnia dowiaduje się, że jest śmiertelnie chory. Postanawia zakończyć karierę i spędzić resztę życia z rodziną w Marsylii. Byli szefowie składają mu jednak ryzykowną ofertę - proponują mu eksperymentalny lek, który daje szansę na uratowanie życia. W zamian oczekują realizacji karkołomnego zadania w szeregach elitarnej grupy tajnych agentów walczących ze zorganizowaną przestępczością. Vincent prowadzi operację w marsylskich dokach i próbuje rozwikłać sprawę przemytników, którzy przewożą emigrantów. W trakcie operacji zabija mężczyznę, który prawie go zdemaskował(n)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Doktor Meier łamie serce Gretchen, gdyż nie rezygnuje ze ślubu z Gabi. Lekarka może mieć tylko nadzieję, że doktor odejdzie dla niej od żony. Jakby kłopotów było mało, przyjaciółka zapada na raka(n)

programme.title: Bez mężczyzn
programme.desc: Kobiety z małej południowoamerykańskiej miejscowości muszą odnaleźć się w nowej rzeczywistości - bez mężczyzn. Wszyscy oni zostali bowiem wcieleni do komunistycznych oddziałów partyzanckich(n)

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: Kiedy 31-letnia Agnieszka razem z mężem Michałem wracała z rodzinnych stron do domu w Warszawie, na jezdnię wtargnął łoś. Zwierzę wpadło z ogromną siłą przez przednią szybę samochodu. Michał zginął na miejscu, a jego żona w ciężkim stanie trafiła do szpitala w Warszawie. Lekarzom udało się uratować jej życie. Przeszła poważną operację. Agnieszka nie pamięta momentu wypadku. Kobieta wciąż udaje, że Michał nie zginął, lecz wyjechał w delegację. Po roku Agnieszka ponownie pojawia się na tym samym oddziale, na którym uratowano jej życie. Laryngolodzy mają udrożnić jej nos, który został połamany w czasie zderzenia. Dzięki zabiegowi będzie mogła normalnie oddychać i odzyska dawny wygląd(n)

programme.title: Panny młode z piekła rodem
programme.desc: Twórcy serii w każdym odcinku przybliżają widzom gorączkowe ślubne przygotowania kolejnej pary narzeczonych. Zwłaszcza przyszłe panny młode są zdeterminowane, aby mieć idealny ślub. Dla wszystkich, którzy stają im na drodze są złośliwe, wymagające i egoistyczne. Aby zrealizować swój cel, są gotowe zapomnieć o skrupułach czy sentymentach. Wszystko bowiem ma być tak, jak to one sobie wymarzyły!(n)
